##### Aluno: Alexandre Maros

A matriz de transição é a seguinte:

```{r}
p <- matrix(c(0.33,0.33,0.33,0.25,0.25,0.5,0.25,0.5,0.25), nrow=3)
p
```

```{r}
r <- list()
r[[1]] <- p
for (i in 2:8) {
  r[[i]] <- r[[i-1]] %*% p
}

r[[8]]

```
